about_the_game:
Welcome to your new mansion, on the Scary Mansion: Horror House 3D!
You and your girlfriend arrived on a scary mansion just outside the town. Because your car is run out of gas, you decide to stay 5 night at this creepy house. But, something is very wrong in there. At night, you can hear a woman scream, a clown laugh, a dead wife or some old granma running around in the mansion. To find out more about this phenomenon, you'll place some security camera footage on each room.
Someday, you found some journal that will uncover the hidden secret that was left by a strange neighbor, scattered on the floor. And when you pick up the note, the manor door was locked from the outside. You'll need to escape before it is too late...

FEATURES:
- 3D polygon horror environtments
- First person control
- Escape room and exploration gameplay
